    • lobbyIsReady

      public void lobbyIsReady​(int lobbySize, java.lang.String playerNickname, java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersInLobby, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ClientHandler> handlerMap, java.util.UUID lobbyID, LobbyManager lobbyManager)
      Inform the controller that the lobby is properly formed and the game can be started The status of each handler will be changed, in addition, to each player is sent the message containing the God Player (who will choose the cards for everyone)
      Parameters:
      lobbySize - number of players
      playerNickname - nickname of the last player who completed the lobby
      playersInLobby - list containing the nicknames of the players
      handlerMap - a map that uniquely links their handler to each nickname
      lobbyID - is the lobby ID
      lobbyManager - is the lobby manager

      worker - worker

      y - col position

      y2 - col position 2

      Parameters:

    • checkHandler

      public boolean checkHandler​(java.lang.String playerNickname, ClientHandler handler)
      Check if request came from the right handler
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname requested
      handler - client handler
      Returns:
      true if nickname is associate to handler, false otherwise
